Reviews.Title: Worked great

Reviews.Content: This phone work flawlessly with no problems! I expected it to have problems being so old but it worked great!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Blackjack II SGH-i617 for AT&T;
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: I was well pleased with the customer service they were formal and to the point and very helpful things that most others lack. Will consider purchasing from them again.
